document_data.name: Ardelnar Trethran
document_data.mainbody: '''Ardelnar Trethran''' was an adventuring [[cleric]] of [[Tempus]] during the midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: He could cast at least one healing spell.
document_data.Relationships: He was an adventurer, in an alliance of adventurers that also included [[Klargathan Srior]] and [[Larando]]. Larando in particular was a friend of his, and they may have been in the same party to start with.
document_data.History:
In the {{yearlink|760}}, Ardelnar Trethran was part of an alliance of three parties that adventured together into [[Myth Drannor]], with a total of seven wizards, two of them archwizards. ut, despite the team-up, they still found themselves slaughtered by [[baatezu]]. Before being forced to flee for their lives, Ardelnar had pried a double handful of [[gem]]s from the chest of a mummified [[elf|elven]] corpse. Ardelnar escaped with Larando and Klargathan. After Larando was slain, Ardelnar and Klargathan ran on.

Eventually, Klargathan called on Ardelnar to help him make a stand; though the two of them fought furiously, they were ultimately ambushed by more of the endless hordes of baatezu just as they reached a clearing with a fallen [[duskwood]], close to [[Halidae's Height]].
